text:
Dear Xd Community, today we are proud to say that we just launched a mobile App for IOS and ANDROID all designed in Adobe XD and we used all the Adobe Design Stack.
These are some numbers and take aways from the project, this is real design:
• :calendar: It took 1 YEAR 
• :fire: 50 Screens - 75 Screens
• :open_mouth: 10 or so Adobe XD Updates 
• :woman-raising-hand::man-raising-hand::female_elf::female_fairy: Team of 15 from designers, developer and dev'ops
<https://www.behance.net/gallery/93237429/Zoomarine-Experience>

Please provide feedback is very important!
